line_1: And with a quiet which no fumes disturb,
line_2: Sips meek infusions of a milder herb.

line_1: And care thy leisure to disturb,
To guard the peace that riot would disturb,
line_2: Let active laws apply the needful curb

line_1: With harness'd necks the pearly flood disturb,
line_2: Stretch the silk rein, and champ the silver curb;
